Ended  up here by accident but could not have been happier.  Fantastic Italian meal, great service, comfortable environment and top notch service.   Just enough out of the way that it wasn't jammed full of tourists either.   If you are looking for Italian food in Barcelona, I'd say it would be hard to beat this place.Beet Ravioli in brown butter was divine, save some bread to wipe the bowl clean!Braised beef cheek was perfect, so tender there is no need for a knife.
